item.description:
Lets Fly to KLEW and have breakfast with Connie!

At 9:30 Project manager Michael Austermeier Of Lufthansa Technik will give us a grand tour of the resurrection of this magnificent bird.

The hanger where Lufthansa is rebuilding a vintage constellation is located next door to the Landing strip Cafe on the Lewiston Auburn airport. After our Tour we can walk next door and have a hearty breakfast / brunch.

We will discuss our return leg at that time, it could be a tour the coastal light houses or go inland and check out Alton bay.

KLEW is Just a short 110 km flight north. Come on Join in on breakfast with Connie! it will be a blast.

http://www.airliners....

http://www.navmonster...

http://www.flytome.co...
item.how_to_find_us: Please meet with Charlie and Steve in front of Charlies hanger for a pilot breifing prior to getting your plane ready.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Breakfast with Connie
